papers.title: Intrinsically stretchable quantum dot light-emitting diodes
papers.abstract_snippet: Stretchable displays that can change their shape and size under strain could be used to create displays with unconventional form factors. However, intrinsically stretchable light-emitting devices have poor luminous performance... The QLEDs exhibit a turn-on voltage of 3.2 V and maximum luminance of 15,170 cd m⁻² at 6.2 V without loss of brightness under 50% strain.
papers.relevance_explanation_from_llm: Demonstrates breakthrough stretchable QD display technology critical for wearable and flexible display applications.

papers.title: Stable and efficient pure blue quantum-dot LEDs enabled by anti-oxidation layer strategy
papers.abstract_snippet: The efficiency and stability of red and green quantum-dot light-emitting diodes have already met commercialization requirements... Inserting an anti-oxidation layer enables pure blue devices with T₅₀ >41,000 hours at 100 cd m⁻² and 23% EQE.
papers.relevance_explanation_from_llm: Addresses critical stability challenges in blue QD displays required for full-color commercialization.

papers.title: Ultrabright and stable top-emitting quantum-dot light-emitting diodes with negligible angular color shift
papers.abstract_snippet: Demonstrates green QLEDs with 1.6 million nits luminance and 204.2 cd/A efficiency using optimized microcavity design... Shows 2.9× emission enhancement compared to bottom-emitting devices.
papers.relevance_explanation_from_llm: Presents high-performance top-emission architecture crucial for commercial display manufacturing.

papers.title: Homogeneous ZnSeTeS quantum dots for efficient and stable pure-blue LEDs
papers.abstract_snippet: Develops eco-friendly pure-blue QLEDs with 24.7% EQE, 17nm FWHM, and 30,000-hour T₅₀... Uses congeneric sulfur to create homogeneous ZnSeTeS QDs with near-unity PLQY.
papers.relevance_explanation_from_llm: Advances cadmium-free blue QD technology essential for environmentally sustainable displays.

papers.title: Eco-friendly quantum-dot light-emitting diode display technologies: prospects and challenges
papers.abstract_snippet: Comprehensive review of InP and ZnSe-based QD developments... Analyzes synthesis strategies, charge balance improvements, and degradation mechanisms in eco-friendly QLEDs.
papers.relevance_explanation_from_llm: Provides roadmap for non-toxic QD display technologies addressing key commercialization barriers.
